citations.desc: ACCESS AND INSPECTION OF RECORDS AND PROPERTY; SUBMISSION OF ITINERARIES.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 3:30 pm on
13-Oct-17.
Honked and yelled from gate; woman came out - not authorized to accompany inspection. She said that the
licensee would not be home for a couple of hours.

narrative:
2.126(b)                    REPEAT
ACCESS AND INSPECTION OF RECORDS AND PROPERTY; SUBMISSION OF ITINERARIES.
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 3:30 pm on
13-Oct-17.
Honked and yelled from gate; woman came out - not authorized to accompany inspection. She said that the
licensee would not be home for a couple of hours.
